title: Experlogix Delivers a Successful CPQ Customer Conference
text:
Elevate 2015 attracted customers and partners from 6 countries for an educational and networking event
Salt Lake City, UT
Experlogix, Inc., the leading provider of Configure, Price, Quote: solutions, announced today that its Customer Conference, Elevate 2015, was a tremendous success. The conference was held in Park City, UT at the 5-Star Stein Eriksen Lodge from September 22–24. Elevate 2015 provided educational sessions and networking opportunities for all levels of Experlogix product experience.
Elevate 2015 brought customers, partners and sponsors together at a three day event designed to deepen their knowledge and enable them to share experiences. Organizations from six countries attended Elevate 2015, including the U.S., Canada, Mexico, the Netherlands, Australia and New Zealand.
Experlogix was proud to honor Allegion – a leading global provider of security products and solutions – as its Customer of the Year during the conference. Allegion was chosen for its breadth of use of Experlogix globally, the mission critical nature of its implementation, and their team’s strong commitment to a strategic relationship with Experlogix. Allegion is replacing nine legacy configurators with Experlogix CPQ.
Elevate 2015 highlights included:
Educational tracks for new users, business users, and technical users One-on-one consulting sessions with product experts Peer-to-peer networking opportunities with fellow users Customer presentations of their implementation successes Complementary solution sponsor sessions and exhibits
“It was great to see such a large turnout for our first customer conference,” said Christian Stepien, President of Experlogix. “We were all energized by the amount of collaboration and exchange of knowledge between users and staff, and most were already talking about the next conference by the end of the event.”
About Experlogix
Experlogix is a premier provider of Configure, Price, Quote: technology, specializing in fully integrated Quote: and order automation solutions for Microsoft Dynamics CRM and ERP. Experlogix delivers the scalability and flexibility needed to handle virtually any CPQ requirement at a low total cost of ownership. Formed in 1997, it partners with more than 450 VARs across North and South America, EMEA and Asia Pacific. More than 900 companies worldwide in a variety of industries rely on Experlogix, including, TelePacific Communications, Allegion, Mitsubishi Caterpillar Forklift, VingCard Elsafe, Otis (United Technologies), Spectra Logic, Husky Injection Molding Systems, Nikon Instruments, Hitachi Construction Machinery, AMX, Analogic and FEI Company. Based in Salt Lake City, UT, Experlogix also has offices in Santa Barbara, CA, and Andover, MA. For more information, visit http://www.experlogix.com .
About Allegion
Allegion is a global pioneer in safety and security, with leading brands like CISA®, Interflex®, LCN®, Schlage® and Von Duprin®. Focusing on security around the door and adjacent areas, Allegion produces a range of solutions for homes, businesses, schools and other institutions. Allegion is a $2 billion company, with products sold in almost 130 countries. For more, visit http://www.allegion.com .
